name.ja: <ruby>最<rt>サイ</rt></ruby><ruby>強<rt>キョー</rt></ruby>の<ruby>戦<rt>セン</rt></ruby><ruby>旗<rt>キ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Add 1 LIGHT Attribute Machine Type monster with 2500 ATK/1600 DEF and/or 1 "Ace Sword Slash" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Flag Mech Ace Breaker" from your hand face-up to your field.
